title: Schema Register
description: Per-component schema match (source vs migrated). EVERY individual item from phase-1/2/3 must be listed: each row, each element within a row, megamenu, each column, each sub-menu. status=validated ONLY when sourceMatch=true. allValidated MUST be false if ANY item has status=pending or sourceMatch=false. Do NOT proceed while allValidated=false.

id.description: Unique ID derived from phase JSON. Examples: row-0, row-0-logo, row-0-nav-links, row-0-cta, megamenu, megamenu-column-0, megamenu-column-0-submenu-0

sourceMatch.description: true if source and migrated match for this specific item

allValidated.description: true ONLY when every item has status=validated. Do NOT set true otherwise.
